property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR. Response: After you win a challange in which attached character participated, draw a card for each power on Widow's Wail.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a location. Attached location cannot stand during the standing phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a location you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Joffrey Baratheon is the only King Character in play, he gains : "Response: After you win dominance, non-unique characters do not stand during the standing phase this round."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except Weapon. At the beginning of each phase, stand Ser Jaime Lannister.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Queen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cersei Lannister does not kneel to attach during Intrigue challanges. Response: After you win an Intrigue challange, Cersei Lannister claims 1 power. Then, Cersei Lannister gains your choice of stealth or deadly until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Tyrion Lannister is participating in a challange, all knelt Clansman characters you control are also participating in that challenge on the same side as Tyrion. Response: Kneel a Clansman character to save Tyrion Lannister from being killed.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a challenge in which Bronn participated as defender resolves, if you control the most participating characters with deadly, the attaching played must choose and kill 1 participating character he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: Afterr you win dominance, if you have 4 or more gold in your gold pool, Tywin Lannister claims 3 power.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Clegane.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Gregor Clegane is kneeling he gains: "Any Phase: Kneel 2 influence to choose and kill a kneeling character with STR 2 or lower. Then, stand Ser Gregor Clegane."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Amory Lorch is attacking, characters that have a Trait in common with Ser Amory Lorch cannot be declared as defenders. Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to give Ser Amory Lorch a Trait of your choice until the end of the phase (limit once per phase).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Kevan Lannister gains PWR icon while you control at least 1 other Lord character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challanges: Discard Myrcella Lannister from play (cannot be saved) to allow you to initiate an additional Intrigue challange this phase, to a maximum of 3 Intrigue challanges in a phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have more gold in your gold pool than each opponent, your in-House Army characters do not kneel to attack or defend.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Doubting Septa would be killed, instead put it on the bottom of your deck and draw 1 card.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should have the trait: Septon

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Clansman.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lord Tyrion's Host gets +3 STR while you have more gold in your gold pool than each opponent.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Clegane.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Gregor's Band gets +1 STR for each non-House card in play with 1 or more power on it.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clansman. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Crawn Son of Calor to choose 1 Clansman card in your discard pile. You may play that card as your next action as if it were in your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Clansman. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments except Weapon. Tribes of the Vale gets -4 STR if you have more cards in your hand than any opponent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have more gold in your gold pool than each other opponent. Ser Amory's Poachers gains stealth and renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of Clansman characters you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lannisport. Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the challanges phase, your unique Lannister characters gain stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to events.

property.name: House
property.value: Lannister. Greyjoy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Sunset Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next Lannister or Greyjoy character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose to play Quuen Cersei's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Coin Mint from your hand, place 4 gold tokens from the treasury on it. Any Phase: Kneel Coin Mint to move any number of gold tokens from it to your gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, kneel Darkened Hallways to look at the top 2 cards of any player's deck. Put one of those cards on top of the deck and the other on the bottom.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are the only player to control The Iron Throne it gains: "Response: Kneel The Iron Throne to cancel a character ability just triggered. Then kneel that character, if able."

property.name: Text
property.value: Challanges: Pay X gold from your gold pool to give X participating Lannister characters +X STR until the end of the challange.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: After you count income, choose an opponent and add X gold to your gold pool, where X is the number of characters that opponent controls. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: After defenders have been declared in a challenge, kneel 2 influence or pay 2 gold to change the effect of winning the challenge of that of another challenge type.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: After a player claims 1 or more power for his or her House. move that power to a Lannister character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Warrior's Sons attacked alone, choose 1 gold or influence providing location in your hand or discard pile and put it into play.

property.name: Crest
property.value: War. Holy.

property.name: Text
property.value: If High Septon would be killed, instead put it on the bottom of your deck and claim 2 power for your House.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to triggered effects.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments. Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Bastard from your hand, discard all other attachments on attached character. Attached character gains the Bastard trait, loses a PWR icon, and cannot have attachments played on it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. After you play Stree of Silk, choose and discard one of your locations from play (cannot be saved). Marshalling: Kneel Street of Silk to lower the cost of the next unique character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Until the end of the challange, participating characters without an Intrigue icon do not count their STR.

property.name: House
property.value: Lannister BAratheon

property.name: House
property.value: Lannister. Martell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Brothel Guard stands, choose and kneel an opponent's character unless its controller kneels 1 influence or pays you 1 gold. If he or she does, instead claim 1 power for your House.

property.name: House
property.value: Baratheon. Lannister.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell. Knight. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Arrogant Contender attacked alone, it claims 1 power for each opposing character.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Lannister.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark or House Lannister only. Dominance: Kneel 1 influence to choose 2 unique characters in 2 different discard piles, and put them into play, under their owners' control.

property.name: House
property.value: Greyjoy. Lannister.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent plays a location, put Shield Island Dromon on the bottom of your deck to have that player choose to either place that location on the bottom of his or her deck or discard 2 power from his or her House.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: Response: After an opponent plays a location, put Shield Islands Dromon on he bottom of your deck to choose that player. That player must either place that location on the bottom of his or her deck or discard 2 power from his or her House.

property.name: House
property.value: Targaryen. Lannister.

property.name: Text
property.value: After Rich Lands and a Keep comes into play, draw 1 card. Attached character gains a Noble crest.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. You may initiate an additional Intrigue challenge during each challenges phase. When an opponent wins an Intrigue challenge against you as the attacker or defender, that player may choose to either draw 1 card or claim 1 power for his or her house.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player loses an Intrigue challenge, that player must choose and kill a character under his or her control.

card.name: All the Gold in Casterly Rock

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Each Lannister location you control adds +1 to your income.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any attachment or location card that would be discarder from any player's hand as part of the claim of an Intrigue challenge may be put into play by the winner of the challenge, under his or her control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose 1 opponent that did not reveal The Art of Seduction as his or her plot card. That opponent cannot reveal a new plt card during the plot phase next round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during Intrigue challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. If you win dominance, all players skip the standing phase this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue Gambit.

property.name: Text
property.value: A player cannot declare a Military or PWR challenge unless he or she has won an Intrigue challenge that phase.
